title: Number of snow sports ( skier/snowboard ) visits in the United States 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Number of skier visits in millions
summary: In general Number of skier visits in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of skier visits in millions is slightly decreasing from 04/05 to 06/07, slightly increasing from 06/07 to 08/09, and lastly roughly constant from 08/09 to 10/11.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 06/07 and 07/08.
The highest Number of skier visits in millions, of value 60.54 was reached at Year 10/11
The lowest Number of skier visits in millions, of value 55.07 was reported at Year 06/07
